section_a.beneficiaries: community members from diverse backgrounds in the East Midlands, via a ‘Social Innovation Lab’ approach to promote collaboration in order to create innovative solutions to complex social problems. Our activities will bring about improvements to the lives of community members who are disadvantaged by circumstance, geographical location, gender, ethnic origin or disability. Social Innovation People CIC aims to become a launch pad for social ventures, and work with them to create long-term sustainable impact and solve some of the region’s most pressing economic and social issues
